titleStmt.title: Great salvation by Jesus Christ tenderd to the greatest of sinners and in particular to such as have been refusers of it, if God shall now at last make them willing to receive it / by Richard Eedes ...
titleStmt.author: Eedes, Richard, d. 1686.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T W for the author,

notesStmt.note: Signature A1 is missing and pages 98, 179 and 191 have print faded in the filmed copy. Beginning-p. 27 and pages 88-123 photographed from Union Theological Seminary Library copy and inserted at the end.
Reproduction of original in Princeton Theological Seminary Library.
